Articles.Content:
Hi

I have a problem (with Ghost Kraken?). When undocking from my Kerbin low orbit station and matching planes to dock with a ship in Kerbin high orbit, my spacestation, and ships within visual all gets ripped apart.

Ive treid restarting the game and computer etc.. but it happens every time.

Any ideas?

Thanks

S

If your SAS on the station is too strong it might be pulling it apart. Or this is because the station isn't really together, and it somehow clipped inside itself. Try loading the station from the command center and see if it survives. Then, if it does, plot a course with the ship so it heads toward the station. then, go back to the command center and load up the station. Then time warp untill the ship floats into visual range of the station and then switch back to the ship to dock.

It might be easier to offer suggestions (in addition to the above) if you can provide a few well lit pictures of the station, and maybe some of the early stages of exploding.

Also, bring up the F3 menu and see what is the first thing damaged. There are a few, wacky, unexplainable bugs like this. Some of the can be fixed or worked around.
